Posts.Content: I have had to do back every other year for retakes or a untrasound. I do not push the panic button when they call.... I expect that call..
Posts.Title: Mammogram needs retaking, please help!

Posts.Content: I lived my life with sore lumpy breats during my period. Thank God age has changed that! It could be fibercystic disease. Try vitamine E (400I.U. 2 times a day), cut out all caffeine and chocolate and see what happens for your next peroid. Me and my daughter had to give up caffeine or suffer with hurting breasts. BUT, with a history of cancer, I would see that doctor anyway.
Posts.Title: Tender lump that comes and goes with Period
